[The gold standard of mineral exploration](https://natural-resources.canada.ca/simply-science/the-gold-standard-mineral-exploration/25145) We all know metals like gold, copper and nickel are essential to our way of life. Metals are used in just about everything. So how do we make sure that we have a continuous supply of these metals? How do you find new ore deposits to make sure we meet future demand? Our scientists are working hard to specifically address that issue. Listen to find out how. -
